website_summaries.verdict: A very durable set of neoprene dumbbells that are still priced similarly to other brands.
pros: Includes 3-pound, 5-pound, and 8-pound weights and a stand
Weights are double-dipped in the neoprene coating for extra durability and still don't have a chemical smell
cons: The plastic stand is flimsy and breaks easily

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: One of the 8 lb dumbbells arrived damaged. The coating is cut and pealing off handle. Trying to find out if I can get replacement for just 8 lb dumbbell or if entire set needs to be returned? Unfortunately there is not an option I can see for this in returns/exchanges. Please see pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sean R. Burns

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WEIGHTS NOT SO GREAT STAND
customer_reviews.text: Weights are just right for my purpose, well-made and I like the stands small footprint. But the advertised product as being of all steel design is VERY MISLEADING, as the stand is just plastic. Nowhere else in the product description does it advise as to the stands material. With the weights in place, the stand easily wobbles from side-to-side like a San Francisco high-rise in an earthquake. You just need to be careful with the stand. The stand could have been easily made out of a couple pieces of stamped steel with very little extra cost. I checked Amazon and other sites for a similar size and designed steel stand w/o luck.
customer_reviews.author: SCOOTER42

customer_reviews.title: Unprofessional seller of product that sends nasty emails to customer!
customer_reviews.text: This item comes with a very cheaply made holder that is in no way shape or form made to hold the weights. The color was also slightly off from the picture. I expected better quality for the price. I have made several attempts to get a refund and it has been very difficult. I DO NOT recommend this company for purchases, be cautious they may not want to refund you even if it is not what they claim!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: got a good deal for the dumbells and they are a decent ...
customer_reviews.text: got a good deal for the dumbells and they are a decent set, the stand is a joke...cheap thin plastic that cracked the 1st time one side was emptied and to much weight for the plastic connectors to take. so now they sit on a wood shelf i built to replace. i would buy for the weights, but expect the stand to break. i wouldn't even mess with putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: kevin young

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Weights and Stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3-5-8 lb set of weights to use for strength training. The plastic rack is durable and easy to put together with a Philips-head screwdriver (despite previous testimonies - perhaps they have improved it). The weights are good quality, and the hexagonal ends are very useful to prevent them from rolling. The weights arrived well packaged and the manufacturer (JFit) included a note in the package assuring me that if I had any issues with the product that they would be there to take care of it. They provided an email and phone number. I could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Tips

customer_reviews.title: This set is good for its price
customer_reviews.text: This set is good for its price. The rack is easy to assemble, but you'd still need a screw driver or a power drill; a little flimsy but it still holds all three sets, and that's what's important. Make sure that when you load the weights, start from the bottom so it doesn't fall down. For parents who have kids, make sure this is stored in a place where they can't play with it. My almost 2-year old is able to lift both the two-pound weights, but she's still clumsy so when she dropped it, they almost hit her foot.
customer_reviews.author: Riya Seifert

customer_reviews.title: The weights are fine, can't really mess them up but the rack ...
customer_reviews.text: The weights are fine, can't really mess them up but the rack isn't much as far as quality or stability. The rack is thin flexible plastic screwed into plastic spacers which can't handle the screws, ie they strip easily when you assemble. Better use as a template for a wooden replacement rack.
customer_reviews.author: jayeburney

customer_reviews.title: No way to reach seller - Missing parts and defective stand
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to figure out how to contact seller but it doesn't work. We got the stand and started putting it together but it was missing a hole for the bolt to go through. I wanted to just get that replaced but I have to return it and the price has gone up. Not thrilled with this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for humans. Don’t recommend for dogs! Lol
customer_reviews.text: Weights are great! Didn’t put together rack cuz looks cheap and frankly the weights aren’t big or cumbersome. I put them in a corner. A friend thought they were dog toys and tried to pick one up as such. Ha ha ha. Dino maybe. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ratcliffewofford

customer_reviews.title: Dumbells nice compliment to workout
customer_reviews.text: These J-Fit dumbbells are made very nice with a rack that assembles easily with 6 screws in minutes. I chose the 3, 5, and 8 lb set, and they are just right. The hand feel is very comfortable with no slipping as can happen with metal. The octagonal design means they won't roll...they stay where you put them. My wife and I do an online workout series and these dumbbells are the perfect compliment for our senior workout. Compact storage, as you can see in the photos, is a nice feature. I would definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jim

customer_reviews.title: good intentions just end up in the closet
customer_reviews.text: These weights are just fine. Lightweight and comfortable. The storage rack also works well. However, just like all good exercise intentions, these will most likely just take up space in your closet after about 3-5 weeks. Then you will just be reminded of how out of shape you are each time you kick them when you are trying to grab a cookie in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workout
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered perfect, packaged perfect, every piece and bam!!! I haven't used the dumbells yet but my kids can now lift something that's not too heavy and workout with me. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set, wobbly stand.
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a great price, although the stand is a bit wobbly. That said, stay safe and don't let anything knock the weights over onto a person or pet. It can happen. Store your set in a safe place away from anything that may threaten the stability of the stand. It will hold your weights just fine, but it's wobbly. Excellent product, just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Tank

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights, stand only okay
customer_reviews.text: I needed a set of smaller weights for my kids to use along with some of our fitness videos. I like that they are the right weight, neutral colors and fairly non-slip. I ordered this because it came with a stand. I wanted to keep thing organized. Unfortunately, the stand is the worst thing about this set. The stand is not very stable, although it has taught the kids about the concept of weight distribution so I suppose that is an unexpected bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Renee

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Ordered These
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are comfortable to hold and easy to store. I had read reviews of OTHER dumbbells that said the weights were not accurate, so I weighed these when I received them. I was happy to find that they were not under weight and each pair was very close to being exactly the same weight (~1 oz different). Very happy with these. Some have complained about the stand being wobbly. It’s certainly not like a rack you’d find at the gym, but if you tighten the screws thoroughly it is plenty stable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good grip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these weights about 3 mos. ago and they are still as durable as the day they were delivered. The colors are nice and have also maintained their vibrancy. My only complaint is the stand didn't come with the screws that are used to assemble it. Otherwise, the weights themselves I have zero complaints about and the product was delivered when promised.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I was finally able to find weights to order for my home. It took five months for something to come into stock and I was thrilled when I saw this set. The weights are great and well-made. My only challenge is that the grip is a little wide for my hands-I’m a female, 5’2”. Otherwise, I am very happy with the weights. I have not assembled the stand because it takes up a lot of room. It looks pretty sturdy and I may decide to put it up in time.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality weights , I thought the price was a little high , but definitely good value for the price . Very happy with this set , it was easy to assemble as well. Only complaint is that the stand is pretty flimsy , but it does it’s job so can’t complain. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Uneven weights/Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews mentioned that the weights were uneven. They were right. You could see and feel the difference immediately. I weighed the 3 lb weights and you can see the the difference. They also feel significantly different if you use them frequently. I have to keep switching hands to even it out.
customer_reviews.author: Allaluce

customer_reviews.title: More dumbbells we need more dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my mother for Mother's Day because she does Pilates and yoga and eats weird salads and stuff. I thought this would be nice and compact for her to keep in her bedroom and the colors would look nice. She absolutely loves it. We joked that maybe my father would pick one up eventually. Still waiting for confirmation on that one lol. But my mom's happy and now I'm not the only dumbbell she ever had! I'm so hokey I could do this all day. You're welcome mom yes I love you too :)
customer_reviews.author: James Fay

customer_reviews.title: Missing a weight in the package
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived missing one of the weights. As you can see in the photo. This was a Christmas gift, and a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Katz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are working out with this simple set. We do so much with dumbbells. I have over 35 years of working out and I made a great investment. Worth the price. Sturdy, great quality stand (easy to assemble with nylar lock nuts). The weights are solid, wonderful and with Covid-19 I am building a home gym. Will get plenty of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the rack only dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Tried putting the rack together and the nuts don’t fit so they don’t tighten properly. Will end up throwing it out. Dumbbells are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this set long, but I like this dumbbell set a lot. The stand is sturdy on my carpet (has never fell over) and the weights are good quality. When my hands start to sweat from doing circuit training with the weight it can feel a little odd from the texture, but it does not affect my performance. Some exercises that I use the two 5lb dumbbells for in one hand can be difficult to hold and use. There are other dumbbells that have thinner grip bars. My solution, however, is to order 10lb weights though since I like this set a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginner to Experienced
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get these after I proved to myself that I would do weight training at least 3 days a week. It was a solid buy that is not excessively expensive. So if you're beginning to do some HIIT workouts and want a good beginner's set, I would recommend these. I don't like the stand that it comes with, but the weights are good for your every day use. I'm not doing any heavy-duty lifting, but these weights are enough to keep you fit and challenged. I like the neoprene - it feels good on my hands, doesn't slip, and doesn't hurt the hard wood floors I put them on top of.
customer_reviews.author: BaconCheddaScone

customer_reviews.title: Super nice and compact and looks great all together
customer_reviews.text: I know it sounds dumb to want something like weights to look appealing, but I like that they don't make my space look cluttered. The little stand is sturdy and holds them well. There was an INTENSE plastic smell when they arrived, but I let them air out for a bit. I haven't noticed the smell since. I'm glad to have them though since my house has become my gym. Great grip and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great weight set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Searched through Amazon's wide selection of smaller weight sets and settled on these. The box was pretty tattered when it arrived but 30+ lbs of weights is not exactly friendly on a cardboard box. That set aside, I was impressed with the quality and the cost was on point. The stand is sturdy and the weights are well made. I would recommend these to anyone inquiring.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vanston

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost and cute!
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned, the stand could be a little more stable. I'm always careful to return the weights as not to ruin my stand. The packaging, the best I've seen in a long time. I have to comment on that because it was on time, packaged neatly, and even came with a note about how to write the manufacturer before posting a negative comment. I am really enjoying the 'ease'/handle of these dumbbell weights. Happy lifting!
customer_reviews.author: Strong heart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact weights for Rehab!
customer_reviews.text: I have been so happy with this little set. I had shoulder surgery and had to do my exercises daily at home for PT. This was exactly what i needed with the various weight sets. Cute colors, nice compact holding stand. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you in shape!
customer_reviews.text: We're not talking World Champ lifting, just some small barbells to tone and strengthen weak muscles. That's what you pay for, a good multi-rep anaerobic workout. Won't even make you breathe hard. Just smile! Weights are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT. S

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help build arm strength after my chemo. They have good grip and it is just what I need. I like the rack to keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Potvin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old wants abs (insert laughing face) and wanted weights so found these for a good price. It was nice to start him off with some smaller weights before moving up. My three year old likes to use them too. They do little workouts every night!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rooker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The j/fit people are terrific! My order arrived from Amazon fulfillment, the weights were fine but the stand was broken. I inadvertently called J/Fit instead of Amazon, they sent me a new dumbbell stand right away because they wanted me to be happy with their product. What great customer service is that?? The weights are covered in neoprene, much better than my old hand weights as they don't slip in your hands with use, convenient for increasing weights as you build strength or change exercises. I love the quality, and love the customer service as well. I would definitely buy these weights again.
customer_reviews.author: achriston1

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Wait
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product shortly after the pandemic hit and it was significantly delayed as was most everything else. I was able to make due with other hand-helds. I'm happy to say that I just received my order and am extremely satisfied with it! Can't wait to do a work out!! Looks just like the picture and extremely easy to assemble the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Mean Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived at my door. Well designed. Weights are easy to hold in my hands. Bracket was simple to put together. Now I can work on my arms to improve my golf game, not to mention circulation and general physical condition, whilst simultaneously engaging in binge TV watching. There are so many easy exercises to do while standing or sitting, using hand weights. j/fit dumbbells set is a decent price and very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Decent choice for the $
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small set of weights and this looked like a good choice. I do like that they don't stink like many others do. They are comfortable to hold and use. Only reason this gets a 4star rating is the rack - could definitely be better -it's kinda cheap. Had two screws that didn't even get tight sigh. I'll try adding fatter screws but shouldn't have to do that with a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Rack broke but weights are great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these about 3 to 4 times a week. They are durable and exactly as described. I am very pleased. If you are buying this for the rack, the rack is very thin plastic. Nothing fancy. It works but be careful not to break it. My 5 year old stepped on it and broke it within the first couple days.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as gifts. They are a great combination if weights for at home weight bearing exercises for my girlfriends and myself to help prevent osteoporosis.
customer_reviews.author: ssmamiya

customer_reviews.title: weights
customer_reviews.text: one of the weights is missing and all so one has a tear in it,,
customer_reviews.author: Aurea Parker

customer_reviews.title: ... am rehabbing from shoulder surgery and this is the perfect range of weights for my strengthening exercises
customer_reviews.text: I am rehabbing from shoulder surgery and this is the perfect range of weights for my strengthening exercises. Good grip. Although the stand isn't super-stable, it does give a great way to store the weights and keep them handy for my 2x a day exercises.
customer_reviews.author: KTfoster

customer_reviews.title: Great Dumbbells for Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for weeks for these dumbbells, mine finally arrived. I really needed the weights for my upper body home workouts! I personally do not need heavier weight than 8 lbs so these work well for me. The quality and finish is superb, the stand very light but seems to hold the weights nicely. I hope it’ll last cause it is a great way to keep them organized. Highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: SAS37

customer_reviews.title: A good set of quality dumbbells!
customer_reviews.text: A good set of quality dumbbells! As another reviewer mentioned, the diameter of the hand grip does increase with the weight so the 8-lb. weight is a little bit large. I have large hands so it doesn't make a difference to me - in fact, the 3-lb. is almost too small for my hand! Other than that, it's a great set and comfortable to work out with. I use them all the time. I haven't assembled the rack yet, but it looks easy enough for when I stop procrastinating!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Appreciated
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get this set for my appreciative nephew. Here I could find the weight variety desired, a simple stand, and colors that are not “for girls”. He tells me he’ll shoot better for more baskets now. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Hand Weights
customer_reviews.text: The item came well packaged and it was very easy to snap the stand into place. The weights and stand are good quality. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good Dumbbells.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is not exactly as sturdy as I imagined for something holding such weight. The screws will strip very easy. However, the weights feel great in your hands and do not get very slick as you begin to perspire.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Good price and very durable!! Love them, glad I looked here before purchasing them individually at a sporting good store.
customer_reviews.author: Guinneyhop

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I did some research before buying these and am glad I went with this option! It was easy to assemble and the weights are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Material and Design
customer_reviews.text: Designed with the user in mind. It's easy to use, easy to assemble, has attractive packaging and looks great on the stand and not like a big bulk of grey weights. The stand is what I like most about this dumbbell set. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Rack went together well and seems ok. My pitbull has Nerf barbells and he got real excited when he saw mine. Must keep them up and away from him. Although he didn’t even give them a second look after I said no
customer_reviews.author: chinacat_110

customer_reviews.title: Love the weight values and the feel
customer_reviews.text: Love the weights themselves and are very handy for my shoulder rehab. Stand is whimpy plastic but does the job. Which the plastic was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Mark .

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this set based on the reviews about poor quality stand. However, the set that I received and put together is made of heavy duty steel and very sturdy. I also love the grippy coating on the wights. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great little weight set.
customer_reviews.text: This set even looks good in your home gym and is very useful. The bright colors make it easy to know which one you're grabbing. Nice rubber coating covers them to protect your floors if you drop them.
customer_reviews.author: H Trans Svcs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great weight selection!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the great quality stand and the weights. I do wish the weights were 10 - 15 and 20 but these will do. I use these in my HIIT weight exercise program and can quickly grab the correct weight amount! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HotLanta

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of weights with a great grip
customer_reviews.text: Great set of weights. Perfect for using at the home or even in your office cube. The weights have a wonderful grip and the design prevents the weights from rolling when placed on a table, counter, desk or floor. The included stand is a nice addition. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price reflects the quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2015ish. The weights are still in good shape but the cheap stand broke within a few months holding only the very weights they were intended to.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not come with all the hardware necessary to put it together. Was unable to resolve the issue so the item will need to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kisska1209

customer_reviews.title: The stand was easy to assemble using a phillips screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: The product came packaged well with all the parts. The stand was easy to assemble using a phillips screwdriver. I use the weights to tone my arms while riding a Nordic Trac Bike. I prefer to work outside but that's not always available. I have seen some concern about the hand gripe on the #8 weight. For me, I would not want the grip to be any larger but I have no trouble with it. For the price this set is working ideally I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bear2wolf1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of dumbbells for fitness enthusiasts!!
customer_reviews.text: Found this product to perfectly fit into my requirements.3 pairs of good quality dumbbells comes in 3lb, 5lb and 8lbs.The quality is well built and doesn't slip away because of the rubber like coating..A plastic stand is provided to neatly stack up the dumbbells..Overall a very good product but price could have been a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: Shwetha Bhat

customer_reviews.title: Love my weights!! Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love my weights! I'm so happy with my purchase! These are easy to grip and comfortable to hold for flexing with different excercises!
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, came packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, came packaged very well. Liked that it came with stand. Seems sturdy and stronger than I thought it looked online.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Merritt

customer_reviews.title: This was a really great deal for a really great quality set of dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: This was a really great deal for a really great quality set of dumbbells. If you're into working out at home, and want to have a small set on hand this is the set for you. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LaKisha Mayes

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: Love these, though the package arrived very late and damaged, the contents were good, only missing one lug nut and had one at home that fit. I have been using this set daily with my peloton app and their HIIT Classes, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Guy

customer_reviews.title: Step it up
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. I like to run and wanted to add some resistance. I started with the lightest weight and have worked up to more. So happy with these weights and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sonshyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great and the stand was super easy to put together. They arrived a day earlier than expected. I am super stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love them
customer_reviews.text: I just received my weights, so far I’m loving them...stand fits perfectly (easy to put together, but use your own tools) in the small area I have, weights appear to be great quality, great colors...Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jointaccount

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY satisfied. Yes
customer_reviews.text: I was really concerned with getting the "right" set. After looking at reviews, I chose this set. I am VERY satisfied. Yes, the stand is NOT super stable, but, I just place it to store the weights and I'm not moving it around. I found the weights to be very comfortable. I do have pretty big hands, I'm 5'10". Overall, I would recommend these weights!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Genn

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just what my wife wanted. Well made, compact and the stand was perfect for storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Easy to assemble the rack. The size of the 12 lb is a little big for smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ivanoff III

customer_reviews.title: Good weight set. Stand could be made of better material.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality weights. Wish the stand was made of heavier material.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: A nice set of weights
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of weights. The stand feels really flimsy and wobbles when setting the weights on it, but it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my workout gear
customer_reviews.text: These work great, but the grip is a little wide on the heavier weights, which makes them hard to hold at times. The rack is good quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cstark

customer_reviews.title: Love the little rack.
customer_reviews.text: Nice storage and easy to grab a pair as we head out to exersice class. Nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: golfvillager

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Good set, easy to assemble. My parents love using this for their light workout in the backyard
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good set, good price
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, It looks decent and are handy. The only reason for the 4 stars is the flimsy rack...I don't think it'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Compact & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Ive even thrown them on the ground, without incident. The storage shelf was easy to put together & fits perfectly in just about any little space.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and perfect for my little gym
customer_reviews.text: Good grip and perfect for my little gym. I was worried that because of the material they would start to stink, but I disinfect them as I would in a public gym. No issues. The stand may be a little flimsy, but it does it's job and holds all of the weights.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: I love that these are organized
customer_reviews.text: Very little assembly. I love that these are organized. As one other reviewer stated, the grip gets bigger as you go up in weight. I have pretty normal hands for a woman and the 10lb one is about the limit for my grip. It makes it a bit more difficult to use than if it were to have a smaller grip. Anyway, they are nicely made and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter769

customer_reviews.title: Great set of weights
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! No weird smell and none broke like other reviewers. Used it for bikini body mom 9.0 workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Shrek

customer_reviews.title: I love this one
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working out upper body while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Donna101

customer_reviews.title: I like the colors - how they aren't traditionally "girly" just ...
customer_reviews.text: As the others have said, the stand is a little flimsy and the weights do have raised seems where they were sealed. Neither of these things bother me much though. They work well for me tucked away in a corner until I need to use them. I like the colors - how they aren't traditionally "girly" just because they are lighter weights. I hope to get much use out of them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katagin

customer_reviews.title: Normal weights, worthless stand.
customer_reviews.text: The weights are your everyday weights. I bought this thinking that the stand would be a nice addition, it wasn't. It is very flimsy plastic and really not worth the extra. Buy the weights on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Preston

customer_reviews.title: Weights are great, stand is not
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great but the stand is definitely not. The nuts to the bolts to put the stand together are the wrong size and don’t tighten all the way. So you can’t even use the stand. Better off buying the weights individually separately. Definitely don’t buy for the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be slightly better
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint- the rack goes together easily- but not that sturdy to hold the weights. recipient loved the gift. Very nice coating on the dumbbells makes it much easier for smaller hands to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: Sheenah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The weights are prefect but the rach is flimsy. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Weight set good enough for starting purposes
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the stand much, but as a starting weight set this is perfect. I keep it in the living room and do a few curls whenever I'm bored. In less than two weeks, I've noticed very prominent muscle tone developing at the biceps, and my triceps seem less flabby. These aren't "bulk up" weights, but that's not what I wanted them for. :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Lunde

customer_reviews.title: Good weights—highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These weights are comfortable to use. I am using for physical therapy for my shoulder and they are helping. The rack was simple to assemble and works fine. I really liked the assortment of weights available.
customer_reviews.author: Anita26

customer_reviews.title: Nice little weight set but stand could be better
customer_reviews.text: The hand weight set is great if you don't want much weight but may be too light for most. The stand could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: This set is a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace a set we gave to our neighbor when we moved. We started a new exercise routine so we got these to add to our equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. The stand seemed cheap and flimsy but it's held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: gaga4ganja

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my wish list for quite a while before finally clicking the buy button. So happy I did! The product came in 2 days, was easily assembled and I was using the weights within hours of receiving. I've been using them now faithfully for days and I'm still satisfied. I like that the stand was easy to assemble (5 minutes tops) and that the weights are made of a soft outer material which is easy on the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a good dumbbell set for women. I use it regularly and do not have issues. The grip feels great. The whole set with the stand is not very intrusive in terms of the space it occupies :)
customer_reviews.author: nyankitteh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Oh my,these are the perfect starter set of weights The stand holds the brilliant color weights. Easy to use, meaning easy on the hands to pick up love them a great product worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Mary Schuck

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Good, I love to work out with these, the only problem is that the support for the weights are very loose and wobble a lot, otherwise it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi O.

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Great grip and they work well for at home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mephistepheles

customer_reviews.title: The stand is pretty thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: The stand is pretty thin plastic, and while it seems to hold the weights well I was hoping it would be something I could carry around. Not quite the case. I also wish the weights had a larger diameter around the and bits- It's hard to do plank flys and plank kick backs while holding them because my hands dig into the ground. Comfortable grip and the material seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great dumbbells but the stand feels very unstable. I'm more inclined to just set them on the floor-- which is easy because they have that convenient hexagonal edge so they don't roll around. Also, only reason they don't get 5 stars is because the larger 8 lb weights handle area is too large to fit comfortably in my hand... And I have average sized hands for a female.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for working out at home and loved the rack it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these colorful weights come with a rack. It looks neat and organized. I place them in the living room so I can use them when I watch TV. I love its pleasant presence.
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: Great little set!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the money. Easy to put together stand. Got this to strengthen my wrists mainly to combat carpel tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Troy G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little set. Great value, good price. Use frequently. Like the little stand. Great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Britany Brown

product_meta.title: j/fit Dumbbell Set w/Durable Rack | Solid Design | Double Neoprene Coated Workout Weights Non-Chip and Flake | Dumbbells Sets For Gyms, Pilates, MMA, Training, Schools, Rehabilitation Centers
product_meta.description:
Finally, The Greatest Workout Dumbbell Weight Set Has Just Been Released! 

Are you fed up with workout dumbbells chipping and flaking all over the floor? Do you need a dumbbell exercise set that will never scratch your precious wooden floors? Do you want to sculpt your body in no time and work out your muscles like never before?

If the answer to any of those questions is yes, then you should keep on read ing because we have the greatest dumbbell weight set and fitness gear proposal for you.

Choose Your Weights, Lift Those Dumbbells & Get That Beach Body You Have Always Dreamed Of 

Our strength training dumbbells are designed from high quality materials so as to last for the many workouts and gym sessions have yet to come.

The durable steel construction along with the double neoprene coating make these weights an absolute must for all those who want to train hard or are just beginning.

Each set includes 3 different pairs of weights so as to choose the one that will work miracles all over your body.

Still Not Convinced That These Exercise Dumbbell Weights Are What You Are Looking For? 

* Durable solid iron steel construction dumbbells for men and women. * Double neoprene coating weights that won’t flake, chip or scratch your floors. * Ideal for body fat burning exercises, arm routines, Pilates, gyms, home training and more. * Non slip handles gym weights for safe grip every single time. * Convenient dumbbell rack for organisation and storage. * Backed by our 5-year warranty! * Compact weight set in various colors. Easy to travel.

What are you waiting for? Get your set today and watch those biceps pumping.

Scroll Up & Click Add To Cart Now While Supplies Last!
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY DUMBBELL WEIGHTS: Designed for some heavy duty training, these dumbbells will skyrocket your workouts, improve your stamina levels and help you tone up your whole body from head to toes.
DUMBBELLS THAT WON’T FLAKE OR CHIP: Sick and tired of dumbbell weights that flake and chip after a while? Try now our set with double dipped Neoprene coating that won’t scratch or flake off easily.
INDESTRUCTIBLE IRON STEEL WEIGHT SET: We here at j/fit manufacture only durable, solid iron weight sets so as to last for the many trainings have yet to come. The non-slip handles secure safe grip.
CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE DUMBBELL SET: Choose among our various weights and get the dumbbell set that suits you the best. Each weight set has a different color, that helps to easily identify the size.
DUMBBELLS WITH STAND/RACK FOR STORAGE: Keep your place tidy and your dumbbell weights stored thanks to our durable stand. The gym weights come with a rack for hassle free storage and intact floors.
